phrs.translation: 电话送受话器；听筒， 手机

sentences.sentence: WP7 handsets are good, if a bit boring.
sentences.translation: 除去有一点枯燥，wp7是部不错的手机。

sentences.sentence: KDDI also launched 10 new handsets this week.
sentences.translation: KDDI也于本周发布了10款新机。

sentences.sentence: Since last autumn it has rolled out 30 new handsets.
sentences.translation: 而从去年秋季开始公司已经发布了30款新机。
